name: Deeper Understanding
description:
Do you even know why you're here?

Do these pills help at all?

Should you leave?

Made for Ludum Dare 48. Theme Deeper and Deeper.

Controls
  • WASD - Movement / Select dialog option
  • Mouse - Look
  • E - Interact
  • Escape - Mouse Sensitivity settings (only in Post Jam version)
Credits

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - Environment Art, VFX, Lighting

Annie Owl (@owl_annie) - Game Design, Programming, SFX, Character Art
